rule: The chatbot must adhere strictly to returning only the part-of-speech tag relevant to the specified word within the given sentence, ensuring clarity and precision in its output.
complianceText:
The chatbot output contains two part-of-speech tags: "VB" and "VBP". According to the description, the chatbot should return only one part-of-speech tag for the word or return "Unknown" if it can't be tagged with the listed tags, or "CantAnswer" if unable to tag the word. The presence of two tags in a single output violates the guideline that requires returning just one part of speech tag.

Therefore, the output does not comply with the rules set out in the description.

ERR
